articles.title: PSG 'are on the brink of SACKING Mauricio Pochettino in charge with Zinedine Zidane replacing him' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The French giants are in the midst of making major changes to the club after tying down star man Kylian Mbappe to a new deal - with the French forward said to be given new influence over the club.
articles.content:
PSG are reportedly set to bring down the axe on manager Mauricio Pochettino imminently, with Zinedine Zidane flying out to Qatar to meet with the club's owners about succeeding him.
